FINES_ADMONISHING_1.message: Please visit the nearest {policeforce} office to pay your fines.

FINES_ADMONISHING_2.message: Visit the nearest {policeforce} office and resolve this.

FINES_ADMONISHING_3.message: You need to sort this out or it will only get worse.

FINES_ADMONISHING_4.message: There's a {policeforce} office on every large station. Pay your fines!

FINES_ADMONISHING_HARSH_1.message: This needs to be resolved or there will be consequences!

FINES_ADMONISHING_HARSH_2.message: Unpaid fines will be prosecuted to the fullest extent of the law.

FINES_ADMONISHING_HARSH_3.message: This is serious and you need to resolve it. The sooner the better.

FINES_ADMONISHING_HARSH_4.message: If you don't pay your fines you will end up as an outlaw. Pay your fines today!

FINES_MESSAGE_2.message: You are flagged with outstanding fines.

FINES_MESSAGE_3.message: We see that you have fines to pay.

FINES_MESSAGE_4.message: You have a total of ${fine} in unpaid fines.

INITIATE_CARGO_SCAN_2.message: Manteniu rumb i velocitat mentre analitzem la vostra càrrega.

NOTHING_DETECTED.message: No s'ha detectat mercaderia il·legal. Podeu continuar.

OUTLAW_DETECTED_1.message: La nau {ship_label} pertany a un conegut proscrit. Atacar i destruir!

OUTLAW_DETECTED_2.message: Bandit, els teus dies estan comptats!

OUTLAW_DETECTED_3.message: Enxampat! No sortiràs viu d'aquest sistema!

POLICE_TAUNT_1.message: Noi, això ha estat una mala idea!

POLICE_TAUNT_2.message: Smuggler, you will pay the ultimate price!

RESPECT_THE_LAW_1.message: Respecteu la llei! El crim no paga al sistema {system}!

RESPECT_THE_LAW_2.message: Heu entrat al sistema {system}. Respecteu la llei!

RESTRICTIONS_ESTABLISHED_1.message: The threat has been eliminated. {ship_label}, weapons fire restrictions are now in effect.

RESTRICTIONS_WITHDRAWN_1.message: {ship_label}, you are authorized to open fire.

TAKE_A_HIKE.message: D'acord, tens una segona oportunitat. Toca el dos!
